attributes.action: Make it an offence for any politician to lie to the electorate
attributes.additional_details: To ensure that the electorate are provided with honest and truthful information allowing them to make well informed decisions.
attributes.background: Following the EU referendum campaigns make it an offence for any politician to lie to the electorate.  Any one proved to have done so shall have a lifetime ban from holding public office and shall have all pensions accruing from any political offices held previously withheld.
